articles.title: Taiwanese singer Jimmy Lin injured after his Tesla crashes; car burst into flames - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Taiwanese singer Jimmy Lin was injured on Friday (Jul 22) after his Tesla car crashed into an electrical pole at a road divider in Taiwan's Taoyuan City. The car also burst into flames. According to a post on his official Facebook page, the 47-year-old Lin wa…
articles.content:

articles.title: Philippine growth forecast upgraded - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THE ASIAN Development Bank (ADB) on Thursday said it had raised its growth forecast for the Philippines this year, but warned that a slowdown in global growth and a spike in commodity prices could threaten recovery.

articles.title: ZoukOut Singapore returns to Sentosa in December after three-year hiatus - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Held at Siloso Beach across two days (Dec 2 and 3), this 2022 edition is organised by Zouk Group, in a first-time partnership with AEG, producers of world-renowned Coachella.
articles.content:
ZoukOut first started out 22 years ago in Singapore with 8,000 party attendees and grew to a peak of 50,000 festival goers in 2014.
